channel.title: Disqus on Richard Sumilang
channel.description: Recent content in Disqus on Richard Sumilang

item.title: Version 3
item.description: Rebuilt from the ground up, the new site is refined from the presentation to the source. The theme has been modernized to load faster and I created more ways to navigate the site so more data is easily accessible while keeping the idea of simplicity in mind.
